name: Spike Salon Barbershop & Spa
tagline: Style for Him. Glam for Her

policies.cancellation: Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours in advance to avoid charges. Cancellations made within 24 hours may result in a 50% charge of the service fee.
policies.reschedule: Rescheduling is allowed up to 2 hours before your appointment time. Late rescheduling may incur additional charges.
policies.deposit: Some services require a 50% deposit to secure your booking. Deposits are non-refundable but can be applied to rescheduled appointments.
policies.lateCancellation: Late cancellations (less than 24 hours) will be charged 50% of the service fee.
policies.noShow: No-show appointments will be charged the full service fee.
policies.depositRefund: Deposits are non-refundable but transferable to future appointments within 30 days.
